other_title: ああっ女神さまっ 闘う翼 (Japanese)
幸運女神 戰鬥的羽翼 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: An Angel Eater has been freed in Heaven. Since Goddesses and Angels share body and soul, losing your angel results in going into shock for the Goddess. Lind goes to Earth to protect Belldandy and the others, unknowing that it is a trap.
opening_theme: "Ai no Hoshi (愛の星; Star of Love)" by Jyukai
ending_theme: "Hanamuke no Merody (ハナムケのメロディー; Farewell Gift Melody)" by Jyukai
